name: Independent Helicopters, LLC
about: Independent Helicopters, LLC is a premier aviation company based in the Hudson Valley, offering a range of services including helicopter tours, FAA-approved pilot training, luxury charters, and aerial photography. As a woman-owned and minority business enterprise, we pride ourselves on providing high-quality training for both private and commercial helicopter pilot licenses. Our flight school, led by Designated Pilot Examiner Heather Howley, ensures comprehensive education through online ground school courses that are compliant with FAA regulations. We also offer specialized services such as pipeline patrol and charter flights. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Independent Helicopters is your trusted partner for all your aviation needs. Discover your freedom in flight with us.
